article_title: Ryan’s State of the Union guest list focuses on poverty fighters
article_text:
Obama’s final State of the Union speech is Paul Ryan’s first as House speaker

The Wisconsin lawmaker invited two anti-gang activist from Dallas as guests

Ryan invited nuns from an order suing over the Affordable Care Act

article_metadata.title: Ryan’s State of the Union guest list focuses on poverty fighters | McClatchy DC

og.description: While Tuesday will be President Barack Obama’s final State of the Union speech, it will be Paul Ryan’s first as speaker of the House of Representatives and he’s using his choice of guests for the event to highlight his campaign against poverty.
og.title: Ryan’s State of the Union guest list focuses on poverty fighters
